! Title: uBlock-Origin-dev-filter – DuckDuckGo Lite – wikipedia
! Expires: 1 day
! Description: Filters to block and remove copycat-websites from search engines. Specific to dev websites like StackOverflow or GitHub.
! Homepage: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter
! Licence: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/blob/main/LICENSE
!
! GitHub issues: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/issues
! GitHub pull requests: https://github.com/quenhus/uBlock-Origin-dev-filter/pulls
||encyclopedia.thefreedictionary.com^$all
lite.duckduckgo.com##tbody > tr:has(> td > a[href*="encyclopedia.thefreedictionary.com"]):xpath(self::* | following-sibling::*[position() <= 3])
||algebra.com^$all
lite.duckduckgo.com##tbody > tr:has(> td > a[href*="algebra.com"]):xpath(self::* | following-sibling::*[position() <= 3])
||wikizero.com^$all
lite.duckduckgo.com##tbody > tr:has(> td > a[href*="wikizero.com"]):xpath(self::* | following-sibling::*[position() <= 3])
||mediawiki.feverous.co.uk^$all
lite.duckduckgo.com##tbody > tr:has(> td > a[href*="mediawiki.feverous.co.uk"]):xpath(self::* | following-sibling::*[position() <= 3])
||everything.explained.today^$all
lite.duckduckgo.com##tbody > tr:has(> td > a[href*="everything.explained.today"]):xpath(self::* | following-sibling::*[position() <= 3])
||wiwa.wiki^$all
lite.duckduckgo.com##tbody > tr:has(> td > a[href*="wiwa.wiki"]):xpath(self::* | following-sibling::*[position() <= 3])

lite.duckduckgo.com##tbody > tr:has(> td > a[href*="secret-bases.co.uk/wiki"]):xpath(self::* | following-sibling::*[position() <= 3])
